body: This is still relevant. Had to set `export TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST=5.2` before running the build. I propose `setup.py` fails fast if it detects an old GPU is present and TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST is unset and prints a reasonable TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST setting.
